title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days and Hours (Drogheda and 
Dundalk) Order 2022. 

(b) This Order shall come into operation on 1st January 2023. 

The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 of 
1961), is hereby amended by – 

 the substitution at reference number 166 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

Drogheda – First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday, Third and Fourth Tuesday and 
First and Second Thursday at 10 a.m. and 

 the substitution at reference number 167 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

Dundalk- First and Second Tuesday, First, Second, Third and Fourth Wednesday and 
Third and Fourth Thursday at 10 a.m. 

The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 of 
1961), is hereby amended by – 

the substitution at reference number 145 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

Drogheda – First, Second, Third and Fourth Monday, Third and Fourth Tuesday and 
First and Second Thursday at 10 a.m. and 

the substitution at reference number 146 for the matter in column (4) of the 
following: 

Dundalk- First and Second Tuesday, First, Second, Third and Fourth Wednesday and 
Third and Fourth Thursday at 10 a.m. 

Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not completed 

before commencement of this Order shall be continued and completed as if this 

Order had been in force at the time at which such business had been initiated. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [590] 3 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
21 November 2022 

PAUL KELLY, 
Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 
documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

MAURA HOWE, 
Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to section 
10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [590]

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note does not form part of the instrument and is not a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the variation of Days and Hours at Drogheda and 
Dundalk.
